tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE packaging_materials_certification_status (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  certification_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  date_certified DATE
)

CREATE TABLE certification_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_id INT,
  certification_date DATE,
  certification_agency VARCHAR(100),
  certification_expiry DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES packaging_materials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE material_certifications (
    material_id INT,
    certification_id INT,
    expiry_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (material_id, certification_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES packaging_materials(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (certification_id) REFERENCES certifications(id)
);

CREATE TABLE packaging_materials (
  material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name TEXT,
  material_category TEXT,
  material_supplier TEXT,
  material_cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE metric_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  metric_id INT,
  material_id INT,
  record_date DATE,
  metric_value INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_metric FOREIGN KEY (metric_id) REFERENCES sustainability_metrics(metric_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_material FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES packaging_materials(material_id)
);
